result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

chargeModifiers.descr: PTAC, as a Party to a Crime

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Kyle A Shaw Jr

records.descr: Demand for Discovery and Inspection - Defendant

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Kyle A Shaw Jr in court.  Attorney Thomas Evangelos Harris appeared by video for Kyle A Shaw Jr.  Prosecuting attorney Annie Louk in court for the State of Wisconsin. 

Case in Court for Scheduling conference. Defense has received discovery, but needs an offer from the State and requests adjourned scheduling conference date be set. Case adjourned to Br. 9.
Scheduling conference scheduled for November 22, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Scheduling Conference set for 10/11/2022 at 8:30 am has been rescheduled to 10/14/2022 at 8:30 a.m.  Matter was originally set on Jury Trial week.

Defendant Kyle A Shaw Jr appeared by video.  Attorney Thomas Evangelos Harris appeared by video for Kyle A Shaw Jr.  Prosecuting attorney Abby Rockendorf in court in person for the State of Wisconsin. 
Defendant waived Preliminary Hearing.  Preliminary Hearing Questionnaire and Waiver received and filed. Court found probable cause and bound defendant over for trial.   Defendant is advised that this case is assigned to Judge VanGrunsven Branch 09.   Original Information filed.  Copy given to defense counsel who waived reading.  Defendant pled not guilty. Court ordered case adjourned for Scheduling Conference in Branch 09.
Scheduling conference scheduled for October 11, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Kyle A Shaw Jr in court.  Prosecuting attorney Patrick T. Franken in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Thomas Harris appears as friend of the Court.

Case in court for Indigency Hearing.  The Court conducted Indigency Hearing. Court held colloquy with defendant. Court found defendant is indigent and is eligible for appointment of counsel by court.  The court appointed Atty. Thomas Harris, present in court, to represent defendant in this matter at County expense and at the rate of $100.00 per hour. The court may order the defendant repay the County at a later date. Signed, Distributed & Filed, Order Appointing Attorney at County Expense. Defense requests Preliminary Hearing be scheduled. Case is adjourned to Br. PE.
Preliminary hearing scheduled for September 7, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Kyle A Shaw in court.  Abby Rockendorf appeared in person for the State of Wisconsin.  Kyle A Shaw appeared by video means.  
Case set for a Preliminary Hearing. State's Witness is present. Defendant is not eligible for SPD and has not retained counsel. Court orders the case adjourned for CAUSE for an Indigency Hearing.  Indigency hearing scheduled for August 30, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION Level 3.  No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms. Court ordered no possession or use of controlled substances without a valid prescription.

Defendant Kyle A Shaw in court with attorney Heather L. Johnson.  Defendant Kyle A Shaw in custody.  Michael J. Odden appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Kyle A Shaw appeared by video means with Attorney.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Van Grunsven, Branch 09. Defendant given a copy of the complaint and advised of maximum penalties, right to counsel and right to a preliminary hearing.  Court reviewed the the complaint and found probable cause to hold the defendant for further proceedings.  DEFENDANT DOES NOT QUALIFY FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION IF RELEASED FROM CUSTODY. 
Case is adjourned for preliminary hearing in Branch PE. This hearing will be streamed live on Dacast:  https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/99073afd-37c2-acfa-830d-b1ddcaebf0ea  Preliminary hearing scheduled for August 16, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
